word: NEGLECT OF PRAYER AND BIBLE STUDY MAKES US VULNERABLE TO TEMPTATION.\97Temptations often appear irresistible because, through the neglect of prayer and the study of the Bible, the tempted one can not readily remember God\92s promises and meet Satan with the Scripture weapons. But angels are round about those who are willing to be taught in divine things; and in the time of great necessity, they will bring to their remembrance the very truths which are needed.\97(The Great Controversy, 600.)
